text:
Hello guys,
I have a 500 error on creating quotes via POST.
Is anyone else experiencing this problem?

Hello :wave:! I don't if anyone has encountered the same issue as me. I've created a CD/CI pipeline with github and I was using the HS api key that now is rolling out. Since I have a sandbox -> staging -> production account I wonder if I hace to change those keys. Because I've realised that it might be managed by HubSpot itself rather us as developer doing request to an API.

Let me know if you have any ideas or encountered this issue updating the API private app. Thanks!!
Nice you can do this with the search endpoint, just set the filter to createdate known
Can you see the API requests in de logs?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
yes, but I'm still using the API key
I found a solution switching it to a personal access key that wasn't documented by husbpot
Thank you!! This is helpful :slightly_smiling_face:

blog api only supports hapikey and 0auth2? No private app yet? Error with bearer token (private app) below:
```Authentication credentials not found. This API supports both API Key and OAuth 2.0 authentication ```
well dang now it is working. This turned out to be a postman issue rather than hs. But the error message didn’t return anything about private apps so it further confused me
Nice was it one of the postman headers?
Is this an intermittent problem or do you just have a bad request?
postman had an update and wouldn’t save variables properly to the PM headers
Ah, yep been there before

Hey y'all, quick question. Does anyone know what the `secondaryDisplayProperties` does when creating a custom object schema? I figured it would be easier to ask here rather than go build the whole dang thing.
That's the property that will be displayed under the primary display property
So like with contacts it's the job title and email address
Heres an example with companies
From the docs: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/create-custom-objects#glossary>
Does anyone here know why the `conversations.visitor_identification.tokens.create` Scope is disabled in my developer sandbox?
do you have pro or enterprise?

It's an account registered on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/> so I can test the change from ApiKeys to private apps. I would have assumed that a developer account sandbox would be able to do anything.
I updated the account to a 14-day trial and I now have permissions. Thanks for  replying <@U01QVR44MEY>
Of course, let me know if you run into any problems with the swap
Are we able to request a higher limit for the total results in the CRM Search API ?
You can definitely request it but that doesn't necessarily mean the request will be fulfilled
did you find out anything here?
Thank you for your response, I tried using <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/2-3829360/search> but facing below issue
